Springfield.Assemblies of God Theological Seminary: The Assemblies of God Theological Seminary (AGTS) is a seminary located in Springfield, Missouri. As of Summer 2009, the seminary offers the Master of Divinity (M.Div.), Master of Arts (M.A.) in Counseling, Christian Ministries, Intercultural Ministries, and Theological Studies, the Doctor of Ministry (D.Min.), the Doctor of Missiology (D.Miss.), the Ph.D. in Intercultural Studies and the Ph.D. in Bible and Theology degrees. The enrollment as of Fall 2006 was 474.
